mapper.select: select com_num,mem_id,board_num,com_parent,com_depth,com_cont,com_date,com_secret,com_blind,com_targetId from comment where board_num=#{param1} and com_blind=0 order by com_parent, com_num
mapper.update: update comment set com_parent = #{param1} where com_num=#{param1}
update comment set com_blind=1 where com_num=#{param1}
update comment set com_cont=#{param2} where com_num=#{param1}
update board set board_thumFileName = #{param2} where board_num=#{param1}
mapper.select: select sub_id from subscription where mem_id = #{param1}

select b.board_num,b.board_subject,b.board_cont,b.board_date,b.board_updateDate,b.board_views,b.board_like,b.board_scope,b.board_blind,b.mem_id,b.board_thumFileName ,m.menu_num,m.menu_name,m.menu_blind,m.main_num,m.mid_num from board b left outer join menu m on b.menu_num = m.menu_num where b.mem_id =#{param1} order by b.board_num desc
